name: Dreadfire
description:
This is working prototype of my game. Where you have a car with guns and you need to destroy the enemy car. This was inspired by PS1 game called Vigilante 8. Have you ever play that?

The initial story that have came in my mind, this game will revolves around post-apocalyptic world where resource is very scarce, so everyone need to fight to stay alive.

Yeah, that's it. There is nothing much to show in this stage. I hope you can enjoy it.
